ack.title: Data accessibility
ack.p: The data used in this study are archived in Dryad Digital Repository doi: 10.5061/dryad.2d6h4 (Thom et al. 2016). Additional information on the individual‐based forest landscape and disturbance model used in this study can be found on the iLand homepage: http://iland.boku.ac.at/.
